Selling my only Hindu.  I just got this graded a couple months back after owning it since about 1978.   According to today's Pop reports:
PSA 4 total, 1.5 (2), 2 (1) and 3.5 (1)
SGC 6 total A (1), 10 (1), 40 (2) 50 (2)

that SGC # includes this card.  $495ppd

I tried to price fair and hope the light hitting catcher goes to a good home.   Please PM and thanks.   -peter
man, that is a very nice hindu! :)
